name: Water Park - Amazing Theme Park Water Rides 2016
name_original: Water Park - Amazing Theme Park Water Rides 2016
description:
Water Park: Amazing Theme Park Water Rides 2016, water slide based game.
This is fun game in which you can enjoy all the amazing rides which are in the water park.

You can enjoy your ride just like the amazing experience and
fell like the water is all around you and enjoy the thrill of the water

- Lots of different rides to choose from
- Less in size so easy to download and user friendly


Have fun!!!
